channel.title: Help Rep++
channel.description: I just added skillcape emotes but for some reason the skillcape button wont show on my client it looks like this:[img]http://fotos.fotoflexer.com/0b9f22291ae94e325c2206d2ac25c100.jpg[/img] so if someone can tell me how to get the button to show that would be great,btw its a PI client and I'll Rep++
